text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends @CNN Oh, hello. Good to see the the guy in our WH is once again being a lazy asshole. Do-nothing-trump tweets about cable ratings while COVID-19 ravages the country. #DumpTrumpDayNov3 #GoJoe
